channel.title: Barrows
channel.description:
I was trying to add PhoneCheck's barrow thing, right? Well, it was going fine, then this popped up after I added useItems...
[IMG]http://img299.imageshack.us/img299/3781/00000000000au0.gif[/img]
Can someone tell me what I did wrong and how to fix it? Thanks...

item.title: Barrows
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

tacoboyy:

use this for at objects //atObjectID you didn’t internalize

I did it, then it says that all the { in this, the one’s before the tele:

	                          [code]else if (useItemID == 85 && //atObjectID == 6771)//Shiny Key on Dharoks Tomb
			{
                            teleportToX = 3576;
                            teleportToY = 9708;
                            heightLevel = -1;
                            deleteItem(85, getItemSlot(85), 1);
                            sendMessage("Wow,You Survived,Lets try Verac now.");
                            }
                            else if (useItemID == 605 && //atObjectID == 6823)//Bone Key on Verac Tomb
                            {
                            teleportToX = 3568;
                            teleportToY = 9683;
                            heightLevel = -1;
                            deleteItem(605, getItemSlot(605), 1);
                            sendMessage("Two down,Four to go,Check your Food");
                            }
                            else if (useItemID == 1852 && //atObjectID == 6772)//Bedabin Key on Torag tomb
                            {
                            teleportToX = 3547;
                            teleportToY = 9684;
                            heightLevel = -1;
                            deleteItem(1852, getItemSlot(1852), 1);
                            sendMessage("Your on a roll,Keep it up nub.");
                            }
                            else if (useItemID == 2378 && //atObjectID == 6822)//Tobans Key on Karil tomb
                            {
                            teleportToX = 3535;
                            teleportToY = 9703;
                            heightLevel = -1;
                            deleteItem(2378, getItemSlot(2378), 1);
                            sendMessage("You pwnd Karil,Lets try that on Guthan");
                            }
                            else if (useItemID == 2418 && //atObjectID == 6773)//Bronze Key on Guthan tomb
                            {
                            teleportToX = 3555;
                            teleportToY = 9703;
                            heightLevel = -1;
                            deleteItem(2418, getItemSlot(2418), 1);
                            sendMessage("The last Brother is Ahrim,Good Luck.");
                            }
                            else if (useItemID == 2944 && //atObjectID == 6821)//Golden Key on Ahrim tomb
                            {
                            teleportToX = 3551;
                            teleportToY = 9712;
                            heightLevel = -4;
                            deleteItem(2944, getItemSlot(2944), 1);
                            sendMessage("You've Killed all The Brothers,Claim your Prize.");
                            }[/code]

are illegal…[br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2007, 09:22:09 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Mod Taharok”][quote author=Newb 2341 link=action=profile;u=66245 date=1176107408]
Hey.

I was trying to add PhoneCheck’s barrow thing, right?
Well, it was going fine, then this popped up after I added useItems…

Can you tell me what I did wrong and how to fix it?
And, I also put // before every objectID, so now it says illegal start of expression at every { before the teles…
[/quote]

That basically means that the variable useItemID has not been defined. Make sure that all of those statements are in the proper case with the variable useItemID and it should equal the proper BigSignEndian code.[/quote]

Yep, new info.
Do you get Mod T’s talk?

Read full topic
